column4: cevan ... yeah im using 9.04 now but the auto upgrade from 8.10 did something evil to the drivers for ATI and no amount on reinstalling the drivers seemed to help ... had something to do with the conf file and the way the new kernel used the drivers
sounds like you might have one of those ATI cards that Ati excluded from the new drivers that are needed with the new Xorg7
... could be but I did a fresh install and it works just fine now
